message: Let's start fair! 50/50 split seems reasonable to me.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fairer split.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think a 52/48 split is fair considering the inflation impact on you.
Given the rising inflation cost for me, I think a 58/42 split is more reasonable now.
I'm sticking to my guns on this one.  55/45 split is the best I can do given the inflation impact on both of us.
Given the significant inflation cost I'm incurring, I believe a 60/40 split is necessary to compensate for my loss in value.
